page.title: 05PARISH COUNCIL 2
page.content: WE TALKED TO TWO PEOPLE ABOUT THE {PARISH COUNCIL.}WE TALKED TO THE{VICE {CHAIRMAN}AND THE{CLERK.}THE{VICE {CHAIRMAN}HAS BEEN ON THE{COUNCIL}FOR TEN YEARS.SHE JOINED BECAUSE SHE WAS INTERESTED IN THE VILLAGE.THE{CLERK HAS BEEN ON THE{COUNCIL}FOR THREE YEARS. { THERE ARE SEVEN MEMBERS ON THE {COUNCIL.}THERE IS A{CHAIRMAN,}A{VICE {CHAIRMAN}AND FIVE OTHER MEMBERS. THE{COUNCIL}MEET ON THE FIRST MONDAY OF EVERY MONTH IF THEY HAVE ANY BUSINESS,BUT IF THEY DO NOT HAVE ANY BUSINESS THE MEETINGS ARE CANCELLED. THE{VICE CHAIRMAN}THOUGHT THAT THE FACILITIES IN THE AREA WERE QUITE GOOD,BUT SHE SAID THERE SHOULD BE MORE FACILITIES FOR GIRLS AND LADIES.THE {CLERK}SAID THAT SHE THOUGHT THE ROADS WERE DREADFUL,ESPECIALLY THE LANES.
